pages.text: $(br)$(key)Spell Prism$() allows your spell damage to $(bold)pierce$() magic defense.$(br2)A $(key)Spell Prism$() can only be used $(bold)4$() times. You cannot enchant it with $(bold)Mending$() or $(bold)Mana Mending$(). However, it is cheap to craft and is an effective early-game way to break through enemy defenses.

$(br)In addition, $(key)Spell Prism$() can $(bold)enhance$() the effects of some $(key)universal school$() spells:$(br)$(list)$(mage/spell#locate)Mana Locate$(): locates a random destination.$(br)$(list)$(mage/spell#summon)Mana Summon$(): spawners will no longer self-destruct after their remaining count reaches zero.$(br)$(list)$(mage/spell#break)Remote Disintegration$(): applies Silk Touch when breaking blocks.$(br)$(list)Mana Light: covers a larger area.
